alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 6:49PM CDT until May 07 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Fulton County in west central Illinois... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 649 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Prairie City, or 14 miles northeast of Macomb, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Fairview, Cuba, Canton and St. David. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
